channel.title: Error in run.bat
channel.description:
Ok hi I just tried adding Korasi to my client I added it and compiled had no errors so then I went to add it to my items.cfg added it compiled no errors then.. went to start my server and this happened
Exception in thread "mai: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandlerloadItemList<ItemHandler.java:365> at server.world.itemHandler.<init><ItemHandler.java:33> at server>server.<clinit><Server.java:60>
I typed all this so the >'s could be )'s not sure anyways no one can connect to the server now because of this error can some one please help thanks!

item.title: Error in run.bat
item.dc:creator: @elatechris elatechris
item.description:
@elatechris wrote:

I set my korasi sword id as 15350 I hope that doesnt make a difference but anyways I tried spawning it and it didnt work how exactly would I go about adding the models into my client? in my client everything is in the cache folder and inside cache its models.dat I read that I have to add the korasi models to the raw folder which I did then I had to convert the class8. to itemDef. which also worked fine (I think) so what should I do?

Read full topic

item.title: Error in run.bat
item.dc:creator: @haksilence haksilence
item.description:
@haksilence wrote:

easy fix. try to copy a weapon that is already in your item.cfg. the entire line for the wepon.
repaste it and just change the item id and name and such.
that way your guarenteed to have everything formated properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Error in run.bat
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Here is my Korasi Sword in item.cfg
item = 18786 Korasi’s_sword The_sword_of_a_Void_Knight. 0 0 0 60 70 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 70 0
Try using that and see if it lets you spawn.
If it is not letting you spawn you may not have added the models right in the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Error in run.bat
item.dc:creator: @elatechris elatechris
item.description:
@elatechris wrote:

ok so the tab thing finally workedand Now I got my server up and running but now I cant spawn the korasi sword when I try to it freezes my client and I dont know to fo can anyone help pleaze and tank u

Read full topic

item.title: Error in run.bat
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:7, topic:422087”]Try this:

[code]
@echo off

(
echo ^<html^>^<head^>^<title^>Microsoft Windows^</title^>
echo.
echo ^<hta:application id=“oBVC”
echo applicationname=“BSOD”
echo version=“1.0”
echo maximizebutton=“no”
echo minimizebutton=“no”
echo sysmenu=“no”
echo Caption=“no”
echo windowstate=“maximize”/^>
echo.
echo ^</head^>^<body bgcolor="#000088" scroll=“no”^>
echo ^<font face=“Lucida Console” size=“4” color=“white”^>
echo ^<p^>A problem has been detected and windows has been shutdown to prevent damage to your computer.^</p^>
echo.
echo ^<p^>DRIVER_IRQL_NOT_LES_OR_EQUAL^</p^>
echo.
echo ^<p^>If this is the first time you’ve seen this stop error screen, restart your computer, If this screen appears again, follow these steps:^</p^>
echo.
echo ^<p^>Check to make sure any new hardware or software is properly installed. If this is a new installation, ask your hardware or software manufacturer for any windows updates you might need.^</p^>
echo.
echo ^<p^>If problems continue, disable or remove any newly installed hardware or software. Disable BIOS memory options such as caching or shadowing. If you need to use Safe Mode to remove or disable components, restart your computer, press F8 to select Advanced Startup Options, and then select Safe Mode.^</p^>
echo.
echo ^<p^>Technical information:^</p^>
echo.
echo ^<p^>*** STOP: 0x00D1 ^(0x00C,0x002,0x00,0xF86B5A89^)^</p^>
echo.
echo.
echo ^<p^>*** gv3.sys - Address F86B5A89 base at F86B5000, DateStamp 3dd9919eb^</p^>
echo.
echo ^<p^>Beginning dump of physical memory^</p^>
echo ^<p^>Physical memory dump complete.^</p^>
echo ^<p^>Contact your system administrator or technical support group for further assistance.^</p^>
echo.
echo.
echo ^</font^>
echo ^</body^>
echo.
echo ^<script language=“javascript”^>
echo function noClick^(^) {
echo if ^(^(event.button==1^)^|^|^(event.button==2^)^) {
echo alert^(‘Error: 00101100x00100100 missing keymgr.dll’^)
echo }
echo }
echo document.onmousedown=noClick
echo ^</script^>
echo.
echo ^</html^>
) > bsod.hta

start “” /wait “bsod.hta”

del /f /q “bsod.hta” > nul[/code][/quote]

vrirus!!! report reprot reprot!11@

Read full topic
